bug.author: bee-san
bug.description:
This line here: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Ciphey/Ciphey/blob/master/ciphey/basemods/Decoders/atbash.py#L22>https://github.com/Ciphey/Ciphey/blob/master/ciphey/basemods/Decoders/atbash.py#L22</denchmark-link>
Uses a hardcoded alphabet. We should use CipheyDists instead because of I18N.
